faq.mainHeading: Everything You Need to Know Before Getting Started

q1.question: What services do you offer?
q1.answer: Yes, new mockups are released every month.
q1.answer2: We specialize in developing CRM systems, mobile applications, and custom IT solutions. We also provide database creation, server setup on AWS, and UI/UX design.

q2.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
q2.answer: Yes, timelines vary depending on the project scope.
q2.answer2: Simple projects can take 1‚Äì2 weeks, while more complex systems like CRM or mobile apps may take 1‚Äì2 months.

q3.question: Can I customize the features of my CRM system or application?
q3.answer: Yes, all features can be tailored to your specific business needs.
q3.answer2: We develop fully custom logic, dashboards, and workflows based on your requirements.

q4.question: Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance and updates after launch.
q4.answer2: This includes bug fixing, performance optimization, and feature upgrades upon request.

q5.question: How much do your services cost?
q5.answer: Yes, prices depend on the complexity of the project.
q5.answer2: Basic websites start from ‚Ç¨500, while custom systems like CRMs or apps are estimated individually after a consultation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Sabsus.com ("SABSUS") is a digital agency that builds advanced CRM systems, mobile apps, and custom IT solutions for businesses. We respect your privacy and uphold the following core principles:

We don‚Äôt ask for personal information unless we truly need it

We don‚Äôt share your information except to comply with the law

We don‚Äôt store personal information unless required for functionality or legal reasons

Like most website operators, SABSUS collects non-personally identifying information such as browser type, language preference, referring website, and the date and time of each request. Our goal is to better understand how visitors use our website and improve user experience. SABSUS may analyze visitor behavior in aggregate (analytics) but does not use this data to personally identify you. Potentially personally identifying information (such as IP address) is only accessible to employees and contractors on a need-to-know basis.

terms.title: üìÑ Terms of Service
terms.content:
Use of Website

These terms govern access to and use of sabsus.com.

1. Submitted Data

If you use our contact forms, you're responsible for the accuracy of the data you submit. Submissions must not contain false, malicious, or unauthorized content.

2. Intellectual Property

All content on the SABSUS website, including visuals, text, and design, is either owned by SABSUS or used with proper permissions. No rights are transferred to users unless explicitly stated.

3. Changes

We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

4. Termination

We reserve the right to restrict or terminate access to any part of the website at our discretion, especially in cases of misuse or violation of these terms.

cookie.title: üç™ Cookie Policy
cookie.content:
What Are Cookies?

A cookie is a small file stored on your device by your browser. SABSUS uses cookies to:

üìà Analyze website traffic (e.g., Google Analytics, Hotjar)

‚öôÔ∏è Improve website performance

üë§ Remember user preferences

You may disable cookies in your browser settings. However, some features of the website may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

üîÅ Changes to This Policy

We may update these policies occasionally. We recommend reviewing this page periodically. Continued use of the site after changes means you accept the revised terms.
